author: automotivetestingtechnologyinternational.com
title: Latest News : Automotive Testing Technology International
text:
SHOW LIVE: Expo opens a flying success in Novi!
The show hall at Automotive Testing Expo North America 2015 has been buzzing since the doors opened this morning. Experts from all fields of vehicle test and development have gathered here in their hundreds to share the latest insights and knowledge in important industry topics.
The sales manager of Automotive Testing Expo North America, David Hunt said: â€œThe show so far has been a huge success. It's extremely busy and with a range of people from all the right fields. We've had great feedback from both visitors and exhibitors, who have been engaged in discussions all morning. And visitors continue to pour through the doors."
The Open Technology Forum also got off to a great start with many visitors choosing to attend some of the first presentations being held. There's plenty more lined up however for the duration of the show covering key topics such as emissions testing, protecting Ethernet-based in-vehicle networks and the latest in data capture. There's also the Crash Test Zone, which has seen many new visitors.
Automotive Testing Expo North America 2015 is open until October 22nd at The Surburban Showplace Collection in Novi. For more information, click here .
